page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: {Grimoldby, Lincolnshire {Housing The style of building in the area varies considerably from neo Georgian styles and post war council housing to older Victorian terraces, cottages and farm houses. The majority of the housing in the area is owner occupied and includes two small estates of former RAF married quarters which are now privately owned. The rented accommodation in the area includes houses owned by the District Council and one Sheltered Housing Unit for the elderly and several cottages owned by local farmers.
